summary: Based off the PC Gamer Blog of the same name, \"The Elder Strolls - The Book\" is not a mod yet, but a .pdf file I\'ve created by compiling all 10 volumes of the blog.
descriptionHtml:
Based off the PC Gamer Blog of the same name, \"The Elder Strolls - The Book\" is not a mod yet, but a .pdf file I\'ve created by compiling all 10 volumes of the blog. 

As of now, I have only created the .pdf file, but if you are interested in converting it into an ingame book feel free to do so.

(Keep in mind, I\'m not the author. That privilege goes to Christopher Livingston) http://www.pcgamer.com/author/clivingston/
author: Christopher Livingston and Joseph Davey
